00029 #include "CellwiseSourcePde.hpp"
00030 #include "ApoptoticCellProperty.hpp"
00031 
00032 template<unsigned DIM>
00033 CellwiseSourcePde<DIM>::CellwiseSourcePde(MeshBasedCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation, double coefficient)
00034     : mrCellPopulation(rCellPopulation),
00035       mCoefficient(coefficient)
00036 {
00037 }
00038 
00039 template<unsigned DIM>
00040 double CellwiseSourcePde<DIM>::ComputeConstantInUSourceTerm(const ChastePoint<DIM>& rX)
00041 {
00042     return 0.0;
00043 }
00044 
00045 template<unsigned DIM>
00046 double CellwiseSourcePde<DIM>::ComputeLinearInUCoeffInSourceTerm(const ChastePoint<DIM>& rX, Element<DIM,DIM>* pElement)
00047 {
00048     NEVER_REACHED;
00049     return 0.0;
00050 }
00051 
00052 template<unsigned DIM>
00053 double CellwiseSourcePde<DIM>::ComputeLinearInUCoeffInSourceTermAtNode(const Node<DIM>& rNode)
00054 {
00055     double coefficient = 0.0;
00056 
00057     CellPtr p_cell = mrCellPopulation.GetCellUsingLocationIndex(rNode.GetIndex());
00058 
00059     bool cell_is_apoptotic = p_cell->HasCellProperty<ApoptoticCellProperty>();
00060 
00061     if (!cell_is_apoptotic)
00062     {
00063         coefficient = mCoefficient;
00064     }
00065 
00066     return coefficient;
00067 }
00068 
00069 template<unsigned DIM>
00070 c_matrix<double,DIM,DIM> CellwiseSourcePde<DIM>::ComputeDiffusionTerm(const ChastePoint<DIM>& rX)
00071 {
00072     return identity_matrix<double>(DIM);
00073 }
